IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[w2_GlobalZipcode]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) BEGIN CREATE TABLE [dbo].[w2_GlobalZipcode] ( [country_iso_code] [nvarchar](3) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [zipcode] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [country] [nvarchar](30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [privince] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [city] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [address] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [date_changed] [datetime] NOT NULL DEFAULT (GETDATE()) ) ON [PRIMARY]
CREATE INDEX IX_w2_GlobalZipcode_1 ON [dbo].[w2_GlobalZipcode] ([country_iso_code],[zipcode]) END
